extendedInfo.description: ***** Get unlimited access to all of the following features, 100% FREE for lifetime ******* Advanced golf GPS rangefinder. Instant distance to middle/front/back of the green, or any point on course* PGA-quality scorecard for 1-4 golfers. Track strokes, putts and penalties for every player* NEW! Shot tracker. Easily record positions and clubs, measure length of your shots. See shots on the map* Aerial map view with Google Maps. Tap to measure distance to bunkers, water or any other point on golf course* Over 30,000 golf courses around the worldMore details:* Save playing history. Review scorecards for past golf rounds at any time* Track your progress with rich statistics, including scoring, putts, penalties, G.I.R. and distance walked* NEW! See stats for 9-hole and 18-hole rounds.* Share rounds via Facebook or email. Your friends will see the scorecard and shots on the map, including clubs and length.* Exceptionally easy and intuitive golf gps. Stay focused on the game* Use 'uncharted mode' to keep track your score on any 18 hole course, including mini golf and disc golf* Golf Pad maintains gps link during the round. This ensures the distance is always ready. It also extends battery life, since phone only needs to do initial satellite search once. GPS is turned off automatically after the end of the golf round.* Rangefinder supports meters and yards.NO registration. NO course download fees. NO subscription. NO LIMITS.***** Upgrade to Golf Pad Premium for a one-time fee and enjoy ****** Pebble smart watch support! Using Golf Pad is easier than ever with Pebble. Just glance on your wrist to see the distance to the target. Yet, you have full access to all Golf Pad features on the phone. Golf Pad and Pebble stay in perfect sync as you play the round. Learn more and get your own Pebble smart watch: http://www.golfpadgps.com/pebble.html* Fully-featured scorecard for up to 8 players* Automatic online backup of playing history and statistics (requires Facebook login)* Ad-free user interface. Enjoy more screen real estate and better battery life* Extended statistics. Putts, penalties, scoring on par 3s, par 4s and par 5s* Club distances statistics, including average length and longest shot for each club* Layup targets. Choose up to 3 targets at your favorite shot distances. Golf Pad will put the targets in the middle of the fairway and automatically calculate your distance to layups. Available for most courses* Show scoring and club statistics for all time, or just for recent rounds or a time period* Access to all future Premium features with no extra chargeLearn more about Golf Pad Premium at http://www.golfpadgps.com/support.html#premium_about***** Missing your favorite golf course? *****We have over 30,000 courses around the world. But in an unlikely event yours is missing, you can map it yourself in 10-20 minutes on your own computer: http://golfscout.contorra.com. If you noticed a problem with an existing course, please contact us at support@contorra.com.Join hundreds of thousands of golfers who chose GolfPad range finder & scorecard over SkyDroid, Free Caddie, GolfShot, SkyCaddie, GolfLogix and other golf gps apps. Learn more at http://www.golfpadgps.com.

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Easy to use, was amazed it had the tiny 9 hole course near my house that none of the other ones I tried had. Love it :-)
reviews.author: Greg Parker

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: A little confusing at first but it eventually made sense. Couldnt work out how to add score for 2nd player and cant edit completed rounds. No handicap calculation.
reviews.author: Richard Potts

reviews.title: Just get it
reviews.comment: Definitely needs to a) add the ability to edit rounds after saving, b) provide MUCH better instructions on how to use features like the Shot Tracker,  and c) drop the Facebook login requirement for backups - otherwise even the free version is above average, and I\'ve tried nearly all of the competition!
reviews.author: Jeff Schroth

reviews.title: Don\'t upgrade to premium!
reviews.comment: This is a great free app,  however...  When I upgraded,  I thought it would tell me things like \"125 yes to right bunker\"  or something like that.   It didn\'t,  just told me front center and rear of green as it always did.   Still like the app,  just wish I hadn\'t wasted $15 on upgrade.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent...but
reviews.comment: Best app for golf by a long shot. I would suggest adding the ability to correct entry  mistakes on finished rounds.
reviews.author: Mike F

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Can upgrade as well but basic app is good enough
reviews.author: Brian Smith

reviews.comment: Great app. The best part is that it us really easy to use so you actually use it. I have had apps in the past which are more re of a pain than they are worth. This one actually gets used because it is easy
reviews.author: Tom Richgels

reviews.title: Almost there...
reviews.comment: Not sure what the updates did, but this is now my go to app for golf. GPS accuracy is still a tiny bit off, but still very good.
reviews.author: Robert Chapman

reviews.title: Good App.
reviews.comment: Was exactly what I was looking for. Easy to keep track of each hole as your playing a course for yourself AND your friends. I also like the fact that you can keep track of your \"hits\" and a \"putts\" separately. The reason I gave it 4/5 is because the gps function is buggy. Its a little bit of a pain to manually turn off gps location in your phone\'s settings. I wish the app had an option to turn off gps (just for the app, not for the whole phone). Also, when I closed the app my gps continued to run in the background, draining my batteries. I tried to turn gps off/on in my phone settings but this did not fix it. I had to reboot my phone for it to fix itself. Great app minus the gps bug I experienced.
reviews.author: Jakub Szary

reviews.title: Really cool!!!
reviews.comment: So far, I love this app! I already played a few rounds and it helped me make some good decisions. I will for sure upgrade to the Premium App. - I also mapped out our local golf course... it was easy and everyone should do their home town course. Cheers (Twitter: @drMediaPro)
reviews.author: David Robin

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: It\'s very good
reviews.author: matt madgwick

reviews.title: The best golf GPS app I\'ve seen.
reviews.comment: Extensive database of courses with great support for adding new ones. It doesn\'t drain my battery. Customizable yardage points are handy. I love it!
reviews.author: Doug Fordham

reviews.comment: I like the app overall, the shot stracking and scorekeeping with stats(putts etc.) Is very nice. However it only gives the option of playing the round from the tips not the mens member tees, the sr tees or the ladies tees. Otherwise good
reviews.author: paswis83

reviews.title: Burns through Battery
reviews.comment: No option to turn GPS of so it burns through battery like there\'s no tomorrow.
reviews.author: Dion Lauriente

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: John Reilly

reviews.title: Excelente aplicacion
reviews.comment: Ad3mas de tener muchas opciones de estadisticas y distancias de tiro, permitr mapear uno mismo una cancha que no este en el menu, toma 15 en un pc con internet!
reviews.author: Eduardo Fam

reviews.comment: Love the app but I would like for the shot tracker to actually keep track of every shot on the map so I can go over my roumd afterwards not just yardages of my clubs. Think that would be more beneficial. Keep up the great work. Best app on the market!
reviews.author: Jason Gorman

reviews.comment: Easy use,  better than any other used
reviews.author: Lee Metcalf

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: App is very accurate and have updated two courses which he been updated very quickly
reviews.author: S Sammons

reviews.comment: Love this ap.  Hard to golf without it.
reviews.author: LAURA MULLINS
